profiles:
Summary Certified ScrumMaster® (CSM) professional with extensive large corporation IT experience, primarily on agile and waterfall application teams and sustaining application support teams. Proven contributor both individually and as a team leader; not afraid to dig into the details. Quick learner who enjoys partnering with others to deliver solutions and excels at customer service. Highly motivated and detail-oriented asset that thrives on solving problems and loves technology. Experience Systems Analyst & Project Manager Intel Corporation January 2010  – Present (5 years 8 months) Multiple roles revolving around SAP CRM. Most recently Subject Matter Expert for critical master data solution that supplies Intel products and pricing to our collaborative Opportunity Management and Pre-Sales Issue Management tools. Trusted adviser to Intel's corporate product catalog team and worldwide sales force, consulting on best methods for organizing product data and improving sales pipeline planning and reporting data quality. 
 
Highlights include: 
- Improved reporting product data quality by 150% after analyzing data gaps across all opportunities from 2013, identifying two primary root causes and implementing a solution for one. 
- Agile ScrumMaster trained. Influenced technical product data solution design and directed an implementation team for multiple project releases including two large data conversion efforts to consolidate transaction data from legacy systems into a single SAP CRM-based solution. Awarded divisional recognition. 
- Successfully led SAP CRM Upgrade and Support Package team focused on testing and release stabilization phases during multiple releases, awarded divisional recognition. Managed proof of concept project to determine feasibility of bringing SAP CRM to mobile devices. 
- Coordinated operating system and web browser upgrade testing for multiple Sales applications including SAP CRM, coordinating with more then 35 test resources. 
- Led annual resource & budgeting effort for teams within the Information Technology group. Operations Manager Intel Corporation December 2008  –  January 2010  (1 year 2 months) Oversaw production support for the IT Sales and SAP CRM Service. 
 
Highlights included: 
- Drove team to steadily improve incident tickets resolved within SLA from 78% to >90% over three quarters. 
- Led end of life efforts on four applications for a savings of $132k in future annual sustaining costs. 
- Owned all support tasks associated with Intel's first ever SAP end of life project. Awarded divisional recognition. 
- Managed major incidents for all sales applications and trained others to improve containment and communications to management across our on-call rotation. 
- Coordinated annual efforts across many teams to drill application disaster recovery and business continuity plans Information Technology Manager Intel Corporation February 2007  –  December 2008  (1 year 11 months) People Manager for a team of L2 application support resources focused on both SAP and non-SAP Sales applications. 
 
Highlights included: 
- Successfully recruited new resources in a short period of time and built up their skills on SAP CRM, SAP NetWeaver, and other non-SAP Sales applications 
- Received highly favorable management scoring from team members in both 2007 & 2008. 
- Managed major incidents for all sales applications and trained others to improve containment and communications to management across our on-call rotation. 
- Supported the local community and Intel's future hiring pipeline by hosting two local high school interns within our team during the summer of 2007. Application Developer & IT Support Specialist Intel Corporation May 2003  –  February 2007  (3 years 10 months) Application Developer providing L3 applications support for SQL and web-based applications primarily focused on managing customer membership data and Intel's marketing programs. Also responsible for managing major incidents for all Sales applications. Application Developer & IT Support Specialist Intel Corporation January 1998  –  March 2003  (5 years 3 months) Initially supported intranet websites for the corporation and advised on HTML and web browser compatibility issues. Assisted intel.com web authors with page editing, migration, and publishing via content management solution. Maintained Microsoft Excel VBA application. 
 
Began web app development (ASP, JavaScript, VBScript) using Microsoft Visual Interdev IDE. Engaged with a business analyst and system analyst regarding requirements. Led application performance, characterization, and stress testing activities for multiple releases on a very high profile B2B E-Commerce solution for taking customer orders directly via the web. Provided L3 application support for our code and partnered with other SAP application teams to solve related web ordering issues. Customer Service Rep Sage Software 1991  –  1995  (4 years) Hey cool, I landed a job at a software company! 
 
Part-time position managing registration of all trial and purchased versions of accounting software modules, support service, and tax update subscriptions. Experience IT Support Specialist Intel Corporation December 2009  – Present (5 years 9 months) Costa Rica Supply Chain Service Desk – IT Support Specialist Level Lead 
 
I am in charge to manage Source, Purchasing & Supplier business’s needs, training and coaching L1 Agents in a daily basis, doing problem management to look for improvements to increase the KPI numbers, leaded the Agile implementation in the TAC where I got certified as a Scrum Master. 
 
Knowledgeable in different departments, Business such as: Accounts Payable, Purchasing Services, Supplier Presence Site and Technical such us: Indirect Materials, Direct Materials, Factory Materials and MQCS.  
 
Leading high level escalations related to applications/systems within Source, Purchasing & Supplier based on service level agreements with great customer service and prompt response to have Win-Win solution. 
 
A multi-skilled SAP professional with good all-round Functional and Technical expertise. Very capable with an ability to identify and then deal with a client’s needs by translating them into appropriate technical solutions. Experienced in providing motivation, guidance and a up to date SAP consultancy service to both colleagues and clients. Team Lead in Purchasing and supplier services Micra - Compucom November 2009  –  February 2011  (1 year 4 months) Worked as a Team Lead in Purchasing and supplier services under contract to Intel, coordinating incoming & outgoing calls, email response in a timely matter among the agents, ensuring client’s satisfaction and handling difficult situations by having good communication and relationship with other departments, managers, supervisors and employees. Incident Management (OpCenter Analyst & Incident Life Cycle coordinator) Hewlett-Packard December 2007  –  November 2009  (2 years) Costa Rica Incident management: Making sure the L1 agents complied with Quality, handling products and/or calls. 
 
Op Center Analyst: Point of contact for high priority/Critical issues related to Networking, Windows and Unix Serves. This activity included quick actions when products where not at the required conditions affecting a lot of users and urgent coordination needed to be done with the application owners, server’s owners and to keep the customers affected informed. Did this project as a student intern in Intel as part of the curriculum. Coverage is one of the most useful indicators in to ascertain the effectiveness and completeness of validation.
